title: This software has made it much easier to organize and operate my festival.
name: Leslie R.
pros: Pros: The scheduling area for seeing the whole picture of what is going on and where. The vendor vetting process is really great for us to be able to really pick and choose who we want. And it is great for keeping all correspondence in one place with the vendors.
cons: Cons: The volunteer area is confusing to the volunteers on how to use it once they have signed up. They can't seem to get back into the times of availability to edit or add things.
overall: Overall: It has gotten our operation far more organized.

title: Amazing, Thoughtful team, very personable. and always there to help.
name: Vernon L.
pros: Pros: Love the communication and awesome support. The team has offered plenty of suggestions and always wiling to adjust things. Any issues have been handled in a timely manor with zero push back.
cons: Cons: Our company has nothing but good to say. We had trouble with the email blast and our image breaking the code and that was the only issue that did not have a solution to allow our image to remain in the email blast.
overall: Overall: Much easier to promote, sale, and track tickets.

title: Event Master not only saves time but gives user controls to better manage and expand your event
name: Cindy E.
pros: Pros: The comparison reports; having the ability to gauge sales and activities from previous years gives us an edge, so we know if our marketing and promotions are effective or if we need to ramp up and better plan. There are so many other features about Event Master that are so useful; vendor and volunteer management, marketing and promotion codes, other reports.
cons: Cons: There are so many features - I wish I had more time to learn them. But Spingo has a great support team to answer questions or give suggestions on how to use various features.
overall: Overall: Saves an incredible amount of time, opens up a whole world of reporting capabilities, comparisons to previous years, manage vendors, volunteers, allows to monitor sales and gives better control of our event data and statistics.

title: Very Clunky User Experience
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like the ability to list events on multiple event calendars. The customer support has also been good. They've been very responsive. I spoke to someone on the phone and he made very helpful recommendations about which promotions to choose for our events.
cons: Cons: I'm using the free version, so the experience may be different if you use the Event Master version. First, let's look at listing events. You can upload one picture and Spingo crops it two different ways. There is a tool that is supposed to let you show Spingo which part of the picture to focus on, but it does not work at all. Pictures are often cropped strangely or there is spaced left above and below the picture. I'd really like to be able to upload multiple versions of our creative. Also, every time I list an event I have to reenter my information. You aren't able to store it in your profile. Any time you need to edit an event, you have to submit a request. It takes a day or two for the revisions to be made, and sometimes they aren't exactly what you asked for, so you have to ask again. Sometimes the site gets pretty buggy, too. I click edit event and I get taken to the promotion page. I click view event and I get taken to the promotion page. I see old versions of events that were supposed to have been edited or events that I deleted in my account.
overall: Overall: Saves an incredible amount of time, opens up a whole world of reporting capabilities, comparisons to previous years, manage vendors, volunteers, allows to monitor sales and gives better control of our event data and statistics.

title: Great customer support, unfortunately platform didn't suit us too well for our event.
name: Nicole R.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Reporting was useful for gathering information for our workers/interns
cons: Cons: Isn't too well suited to our events. MUST have email traffic within system. Needs to be more customizable to suit different types of events, have the gamer profile was very confusing for our workers/interns signing up. This doesn't pertain to us so it shouldn't even be showing . We have workers & interns, so we had to break those up.
overall: Overall: Saves an incredible amount of time, opens up a whole world of reporting capabilities, comparisons to previous years, manage vendors, volunteers, allows to monitor sales and gives better control of our event data and statistics.
